title: Liquidity for cross-border payments
description: Traditional banks shut down nearly 180 days per year, creating liquidity shortages for cross-border Money Transfer Operators (MTOs)
solution: A Cardano-powered DeFi lending platform enabling MTOs to access liquidity in exchange for competitive returns for liquidity providers
experience: Our team operates DeeMoney, the largest licensed MTO in Thailand. We have hands-on experience and a proven successful track record.
